E bidoro European Week for Waste Reduction (EWWR) dị ka ọrụ afọ atọ nke LIFE+ Programme nke European Commission kwadoro ruo July 2012

[isi iyi   Ọ na-aga n'ihu na-ewere ọnọdụ n'afọ ndị na-esonụ. Mbipụta nke afọ 2012 nke EWWR mere site na 17 ruo 25 Nọvemba 2012 n'okpuru nkwado nke Maazị Janez Potočnik, European Commissioner for the Environment
Ebumnuche ya bụ ịhazi ọtụtụ ihe n'ime otu izu, gafee Europe, nke ga-eme ka a mara banyere mbelata mkpofu
Kwa afọ, a na-akwụ ụgwọ maka ihe omume kachasị mma n'oge emume onyinye na Brussels n'etiti ụlọ ọrụ Europe
Kemgbe mmalite nke oru ngo a, emejuputala ihe kariri 20.000 omume na-eme ka a mara ihe banyere mgbochi mkpofu n'ime usoro nke EWWR.
Ụbọchị 2017 bụ site na 18 ruo 27 November.
Ndị mmekọ ise nke ọrụ a bụ:
